models.name: discussion_board_categories
models.description: Discussion board categories representing the classification domains such as Economic and Political. Core to content organization and filtering. This table allows independent CRUD operations and is referenced by posts within the discussion board domain.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: The unique name of the category, e.g., Economic or Political.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional detailed description of the category's purpose or scope.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of when the category was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last update to the category.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for the category, null if active.

models.name: discussion_board_guests
models.description: Guest users information who do not authenticate but may have session or visitor footprints. Used to track guest activity and enable browsing capabilities without login. This entity has minimal fields and no authentication credentials.

plainFields.name: session_token
plainFields.description: Unique session token to identify guest user session.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest session was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last guest session update.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp if guest session is invalidated.

models.name: discussion_board_members
models.description: Registered members who can create discussion topics and replies. Members have authenticated sessions using email and password hash and can manage their profiles.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Member's unique email address for login and communication.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for member authentication.

plainFields.name: display_name
plainFields.description: Display name shown publicly in posts and replies.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the member account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last update to the member account.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp if the member account is deactivated.

models.name: discussion_board_moderators
models.description: Moderator users with elevated privileges to manage and moderate posts and replies. Moderators authenticate with email and password hash, and can perform editing and deletion actions.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Moderator's unique email address for login and communication.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for moderator authentication.

plainFields.name: display_name
plainFields.description: Display name shown in moderation logs and actions.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the moderator account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last update to the moderator account.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp if the moderator account is deactivated.

models.name: discussion_board_admins
models.description: Administrator users with full system privileges including user management, system configuration, and moderation oversight. Admins authenticate via email and password hash and have full control over system settings.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Administrator's unique email address for login and management.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for administrator authentication.

plainFields.name: display_name
plainFields.description: Display name for administrator identification in audit and management logs.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the administrator account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last update to the administrator account.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp if the administrator account is deactivated.

models.name: discussion_board_posts
models.description: Discussion Board Posts representing user-generated discussion topics within economic or political categories. Each post is authored by a member and belongs to one category. Posts contain validated title and body content with timestamps and status fields for moderation and lifecycle management. Indexed for efficient searching and browsing with full-text search support on title and body content. Related to discussion_board_categories and discussion_board_members for category and owner relationships.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Post title between 5 and 100 characters, validated content.

plainFields.name: body
plainFields.description: Post body content up to 5000 characters, validated and profanity-checked.

plainFields.name: post_status
plainFields.description: Status of the post indicating moderation or visibility state.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the post was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the post was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the post was soft deleted; null if active.

models.name: discussion_board_replies
models.description: Replies to discussion board posts authored by members. Each reply is attached to a single post and contains validated textual content. Replies have status fields for moderation, timestamps for auditing, and support efficient retrieval and filtering. Linked to posts and members with referential integrity and indexed for performance on common queries including full-text search on content.

plainFields.name: content
plainFields.description: Reply content between 5 and 1000 characters, validated and profanity-checked.

plainFields.name: reply_status
plainFields.description: Status of the reply indicating moderation or visibility state.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the reply was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the reply was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the reply was soft deleted; null if active.

models.name: discussion_board_moderation_logs
models.description: Audit log for moderator actions on posts and replies within the discussion board. This table records the user performing the action (moderator or admin), the type of action (edit, delete, etc.), associated post or reply IDs, detailed notes, and timestamps for auditing and compliance purposes. It ensures a historical record of all moderation activities and supports accountability and transparency.

foreignFields.name: moderator_id
foreignFields.description: User performing the moderation action. Can be moderator or admin. References either discussion_board_moderators.id or discussion_board_admins.id but treated as nullable foreign key here.

plainFields.name: action_type
plainFields.description: Type of moderation action performed, e.g., 'edit', 'delete', 'approve'.

plainFields.name: action_details
plainFields.description: Detailed notes or comments about the moderation action.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of when the moderation action was performed.
